translated: The Paṭṭhāna🔽The Dhamma Paccaya Table, The Paṭṭhāna Text with the Tikas

The Triad on the Wholesome, the Triad on Seeing, etc.🔽With the unwholesome as condition, a wholesome … an unwholesome … a neither-unwholesome-nor-wholesome …🔽With the unwholesome as condition, a wholesome … an unwholesome … a neither-unwholesome-nor-wholesome …🔽With the unwholesome as condition, a wholesome … an unwholesome … a neither-unwholesome-nor-wholesome …

original: Nakusalaṁ nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ🔽dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke
analyzed: na kusalam na dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na bhāvanāya pahātabba  dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke
translated: With the unwholesome as condition, a wholesome … an unwholesome … a neither-unwholesome-nor-wholesome …

original: nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.🔽Nakusalaṁ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: nava pe a vigate ekūnatisa  na kusalam na na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca
translated: With the unwholesome as condition, a wholesome … an unwholesome … a neither-unwholesome-nor-wholesome …🔽With the unwholesome as condition, a wholesome … an unwholesome … a neither-unwholesome-nor-wholesome …🔽With the unwholesome as condition, a wholesome … an unwholesome … a neither-unwholesome-nor-wholesome …

original: Nakusalaṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nabhāvanāya🔽pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa🔽…pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: na kusalam na dassanena pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na bhāvanāya  pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa  pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Nakusalaṁ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na kusalam na na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca
translated: With the unwholesome as condition, a wholesome … an unwholesome … a neither-unwholesome-nor-wholesome …🔽With the unwholesome as condition, a wholesome … an unwholesome … a neither-unwholesome

original: Nakusalaṁ naācayagāmiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: na kusalam na ācaya gāmim dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekavīsa ārammaṇe sattarasa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekavīsa
translated: With a profitable, not-retarding, … (in brief) … With a cause as condition, twenty-one. With an object as condition, seventeen. … With a nutriment as condition, seven. … With an element as condition, twenty-one. …

original: Nakusalaṁ naapacayagāmiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: na kusalam na apacaya gāmim dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa
translated: With a profitable, not-promoting, … (in brief) … With a cause as condition, twenty-nine. With an object as condition, twenty-four. … With a nutriment as condition, seven. … With an element as condition, twenty-nine. …

original: Nakusalaṁ nanevācayagāmināpacayagāmiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Sabbattha sattarasa. Vipākaṁ natthi.)🔽Nakusalaṁ nasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ naasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: na kusalam na neva ācaya gāminā apacaya gāmim dhammam paṭicca sabbattha sattarasa vipākam natthi  na kusalam na sekkham dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na asekkham dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa
translated: With a profitable, neither-retarding-nor-promoting, … (everywhere seventeen. There is no fruition.)🔽With a profitable, not-adept, … (in brief) … With a cause as condition, twenty-nine. With an object as condition, twenty-four. … With a nutriment as condition, seven. … With an element as condition, twenty-nine. …

original: Nakusalaṁ nanevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā sattarasa …pe… āsevane nava …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate sattarasa.
analyzed: na kusalam na nevasekkha nāsekkham dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā sattarasa pe āsevane nava pe vipāke nava pe avigate sattarasa
translated: With a profitable, neither-adept-nor-not-adept, … (in brief) … With a cause as condition, seventeen. … With a pursuit as condition, seven. … With a fruition as condition, seven. … With an element as condition, seventeen.

original: Nakusalaṁ naparittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate sattarasa.🔽Nakusalaṁ namahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ naappamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.🔽Nakusalaṁ naparittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ namahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ naappamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam na parittam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā sattarasa pe vipāke nava pe avigate sattarasa  na kusalam na mahaggatam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na appamāṇam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa  na kusalam na paritta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na mahaggata ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na appamāṇa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta
translated: With a profitable, not-limited, idea as condition … (in brief) … With a cause as condition there are seventeen. … With an effect as condition there are nine. … With an inconstant as condition there are seventeen.🔽With a profitable, exalted, idea as condition … With a profitable, immeasurable, idea as condition … (in brief) … With a cause as condition there are thirty-nine. With an object as condition there are twenty-four. … With an effect as condition there are nine. … With an inconstant as condition there are thirty-nine.🔽With a profitable, not limited-as-object, idea as condition … With a profitable, exalted-as-object, idea as condition … With a profitable, immeasurable-as-object, idea as condition … (in brief) …
